casebody.data:
Irving M. AUSTIN, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 1, 1927. No. 100. Griffiths & Content, of New York City (Charles H. Griffiths and Clarence V. Opper, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Robert B. Watts, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
